Description:
FlyAkeed, a leading information technology and services company, is seeking a highly motivated People Operations Senior Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have at least 3 years of relevant experience and will be responsible for all aspects of people operations. As our People Operations Senior Specialist, you will manage employee relations, provide guidance and support to management and team members, and ensure compliance with all relevant employment laws and regulations.Manage employee relations and provide guidance and support to management and team members.
Oversee the recruitment and hiring process, from sourcing to onboarding.
Develop and implement employee retention programs.
Ensure compliance with all relevant employment laws and regulations.
Manage and maintain HR databases and employee records.
Maintain knowledge of industry trends and best practices.
Participate in special projects and initiatives as required.Job Details
